thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Rita

author: Rita
title: Rita
text:
I am very lucky to have my property listed with Nelson Alexander as everything they have promised they have delivered.
I am also very fortunate to have Ms Madeleine Cahill as my Property Manager. Nothing is ever an issue or too hard for her. She is a very responsive person and always tries very hard to get you the best possible outcome and as as Landlord this is very much appreciated. Madeleine most certainly makes my life easier when dealing with my tenants on my behalf. Finally one very important quality is knowing what your landlords need and how they like things done is key to managing the relationship and Madeleine does that really well.
Many thanks Madeleine for all that you do.
